question: Which country recently announced an emergency fund of $8.3 billion for tackling the coronavirus outbreak?
explanation:
US President Donald Trump recently signed an $ 8.3 billion emergency fund to assist the tackling measures of coronavirus outbreak.
The Senate passed the legislation yesterday to help tackle the outbreak, that has killed 12 people in the US and infected more than 200 people. Last week, it was announced that the US will announce $2.5 billion, but it was incresed after the legislation and the Presidentâ€™s consent.
